item.title: Issue submitting paper to arXiv; dvips issue with colors
item.author: blazeva1 -a- fit.cvut.cz <Václav Blažej> (Václav Blažej)
item.description: On submitting a paper to arXiv I got an error “cannot convert to PDF” with no apparent reason. The minimum non-working example is as main.tex: \documentclass[a4paper]{article} \usepackage{xcolor} \definecolor[named]{customColor}{rgb}{0.31,0.31,0.33} \begin{document} \textcolor{customColor} Hello world \end{document} Compiling it with latexmk -ps main.tex yields the following error. Running 'ps2pdf -dALLOWPSTRANSPARENCY "main.ps" "main.pdf"' ------------ Error: /undefined in XC@customColor Operand stack: Execution stack: %interp_exit .runexec2 --nostringval-- --nostringval-- --nostringval-- 2 %stopped_push --nostringval-- --nostringval-- --nostringval-- false 1 %stopped_push 1990 1 3 %oparray_pop 1989 1 3 %oparray_pop 1977 1 3 %oparray_pop 1833 1 3 %oparray_pop --nostringval-- %errorexec_pop .
